title: The Gary Null Show
content:
Todayâ€™s guest is Michael Ruppert and he is a former LAPD narcotics investigator and whistleblower who was forced out of... <!--more--> the police department while holding its highest ratings and with no disciplinary action.
Since then, Michael has become an investigative reporter and an author focusing on the oil cartels, peak oil and a post-oil society.
He has served as a questioner before a Congressional briefing addressing flaws in the Keane Commission report on 911.
